translations: n.补足物，衬托物；足数，足额；补语；余角；补体，防御素

sentences.sentence: There will be a written examination to complement the practical test.
sentences.translation: 会有一次书面考试来补充实践测试。

sentences.sentence: The therapy can be a useful technique to complement traditional forms of psychotherapy.
sentences.translation: 这种疗法可以作为一个有效的技巧，作为传统心理疗法的补充。

sentences.sentence: We must aim to complement the rationality of the machine, rather than to compete with it.
sentences.translation: 我们必须致力于补足机器的理性，而不是与它竞争。
